metadata.title: CVE-2024-8184 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: There exists a security vulnerability in Jetty'sThreadLimitHandler.getRemote() which can be exploited by unauthorized usersto cause remote denial-of-service (DoS) attack.  By repeatedly sendingcrafted requests, attackers can trigger OutofMemory errors and exhaust theserver's memory.

criterions.comment: jetty package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
